meanings.definition: To make (something) more attractive by adding decorative elements.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys ornamenting her room with colorful posters.
meanings.sent2: The artist spent hours ornamenting the vase with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The cat was caught ornamenting the Christmas tree with its toys.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter ornamented the room like a melody.
meanings.sent5: The flowers ornamenting the garden attracted butterflies and bees.

meanings.definition: To embellish or adorn (something) with decorative details.
meanings.sent1: He likes ornamenting his cakes with frosting flowers.
meanings.sent2: The tailor was ornamenting the dress with delicate lace trim.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was caught ornamenting its nest with shiny objects.
meanings.sent4: Her smile ornamented her face like a radiant jewel.
meanings.sent5: The stars ornamenting the night sky twinkled brightly.
